reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great book for book layout and design
reviews.reviewText: I really think this is helping me to get my story(s) on its feet. It has some great advice and the notes it has you take really help organize your thoughts into something useful. Very happy with this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for true fantasy lovers, not just writers
reviews.reviewText: I have read a few dozen books on writing fiction, and this is the only book that I would enjoy reading as much as a sci-fi or fantasy reader as a fantasy writer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars 2/3 rds of the book is horrible
reviews.reviewText: OK if 2 thirds of the book is bad why do I give it 4 stars? The initial essay by Card is so very good that it alone makes the book worth it. If you can find just the essay get that and skip the rest.The last two thirds are so terribly bad I wont waste my time describing it. SKIP it. It will be a total waste of time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2013
reviews.reviewText: I love this book. It took two books that I consider essential reference guides and consolidated them; also providing me with some additional information on the industry. The only thing I was disappointed by is that i m this volume cut out the section Card wrote on living as a writer. Card's candid information should have been included.Overall, this was a great purchase, and I will be getting copies for some of my writer friends for Christmas.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Reference Guide for Fantasy Writers
reviews.reviewText: This is a great reference book for fantasy writers. Whether you are new to fantasy writing or on your third book, this is a great resource to have on hand to help you develop ideas. Lots of great lists and descriptions in this one. I highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 9, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Ultimate How to Write Guide
reviews.reviewText: I love writing, but my work really came alive after reading this book. A must have for all writers, not just Sci-fi/Fantasy fans.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A good starting point
reviews.reviewText: My big gripe is I bought this book listed as brand new sold by Amazon.com. And what I received was an obviously used book that has a scruffle at the top corner on the spine, and the front cover is creased. The pages are slightly yellowing. I'm keeping it, but it shouldn't have been sold as new so I'm knocking off a star. That being said, this book is the required reading material for a workshop via Writer's Digest, (now owned by Penguin Random House) titled 'Writing the Science Fiction & Fantasy Novel.' It's over $300 so I thought I'd read the book solo, plus the book looks like it's pretty decent without an instructor. At the least it may inspire a few thoughts or ideas. If you're brand new it'll be helpful as it gives you the general layout of how fantasy usually goes, but if you're smart you'll use it as a launching pad for going beyond the concepts given. If you're already experienced you probably won't find it as helpful, so I'd list this as a great starting point for someone just starting out. Or a decent reminder for someone who isn't. But that's just my opinion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2017
reviews.reviewText: This book is super useful to anyone wanting to write fantasy or sci-fi! It's easy to read and filled with useful knowledge and terms that every SF and fantasy writer should know.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 28, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: Great advice and good review of the genre
reviews.reviewText: This book will be of interest if you want to write more compelling sci fi and fantasy or if you’re just interested in the field. It has both advice, writing tips, and essays on the state of the field. In contrast to other books, this one excels in its explanations, particularly the fact that they’re backed up with examples to hammer points homeIf you found this review useful in any way I’d be super grateful if you clicked the “helpful” button below to let me know :)
Un imprescindible, libro completisimo y si el inglés no es un inconveniente lo recomiendo totalmente

reviews.reviewTitle: Was a gift but told it was brilliant and very informative.
reviews.reviewText: The book was excellent apparently - bought as a gift

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 1, 2015
reviews.reviewText: I bought this book for my son in law to be who is a budding writer. He says it's great,so I am pleased he has found it useful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 28, 2018
